ui

Class TextualVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.TextualVisualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicObserver, IObserver, IVisualizer

    public class TextualVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVisualizer
    Visualizes the IGame's progress through text output.
